meanings.definition: The quality or ability of being easily shared.
meanings.sent1: The shareability of the video made it go viral on social media.
meanings.sent2: The shareability of the document allowed everyone in the team to access it.
meanings.sent3: The shareability of the cake was so high that it disappeared within minutes at the party.
meanings.sent4: The shareability of knowledge is like a flame that can light up many minds.
meanings.sent5: The shareability of the photo was so great that it reached people across the globe.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something can be shared.
meanings.sent1: The shareability of the link determined its reach on the internet.
meanings.sent2: The shareability of the news article was evident from the number of shares it received.
meanings.sent3: The shareability of the joke made everyone in the room burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The shareability of emotions is what connects us as human beings.
meanings.sent5: The shareability of the song touched the hearts of many listeners.
